text: Hi Everyone - My Mkt Team gave me a website created on Webflow and asked me to bring it over to HubSpot.  I’m new to HubSpot and I have tried to search for related guidelines on Google but could not found one that help out my need. Anyone has some experience on this topic please give me some instruction! Many Thanks!

Hey, I built an interactive CLI to create HubSpot CMS themes with the standard boilerplate plus Webpack,  PostCSS, TailwindCSS, Babel, and more. Check it out here: <https://www.fasterbetter.dev/blog/create-HubSpot-project>
Let me know if you try it—I want to make sure the instructions are clear enough
